right.text: And of course you can't just have all the cool sounds in a same conlang... nobody could pronounce it if it had that many sounds :)

left.text: Making a conlang is hard... there's so many cool sounds you can have :/

right.text: fungahhh yes. for one thing, he's talking about an auxlang, not a conlang

left.text: this is why i hate madbrain, right there
